T02D2545b:17a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma singg'a ti bi dhi manda la n'a ma /
T02D2545b:17a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2545b:17a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2545b:17a-5: ma chags spyan mnga' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas /
T02D2545b:17a-6: chags med don rtogs 'dod chags gnas nas dag /'jam dpal rnon po de la gus btud de /
T02D2545b:17a-7: 'dod chags padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad /
T02D2545b:17a-8: de la 'dod chags kyi gnyen por sangs rgyas snang
T02D2545b:17a-9: ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas
T02D2545b:17a-10: / snying rje chen po'i blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis /
T02D2545b:17a-11: slob ma ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa
T02D2545b:17a-12: rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir grong khyer la sogs pa'i
T02D2545b:17a-13: gnas su nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba spangs
T02D2545b:17a-14: te the tshom dang dogs pa thams cad spangs nas
T02D2545b:17a-16: manda la dang mchod pa bshams nas srung ba'i 'khor
T02D2545b:17a-17: lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la chos thams
T02D2545b:17a-18: cad nam mkha'i dkyil ltar bltas te /
T02D2545b:17a-19: sems kyi snang ba a'a li dang k'a li'i phreng
T02D2545b:17a-20: ba skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i 'od zer lnga
T02D2545b:17a-21: yang glog bzhin 'gyu ba las 'byung ba chen po
T02D2545b:17a-22: bzhis btegs pa'i khang pa'i nang na rang gi gdan
T02D2545b:17a-23: yang rma bya las grub pa'i steng du rdzogs pa'i
T02D2545b:17a-24: sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas nges par hr'i: las
T02D2545b:17a-25: byung ba'i sbyor ba ye shes sems dpa'i bar du
T02D2545b:17a-26: rdzogs pa dang / de'i byin gyis rlabs kyis dkyil
T02D2545b:17a-27: 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rang gi rigs dang
T02D2545b:17a-28: mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang 'dod chags can
T02D2545b:17a-29: gyi gdul bya'i dor gang la sangs rgyas kyi sku
T02D2545b:17a-30: phra mo mang po yang mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs
T02D2545b:17a-31: las byung ba'i las rgyal mchog bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2545b:17a-32: de ltar padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang nye bar
T02D2545b:17a-33: gyur nas 'dod chags can gyi sems can rnams dkyil
T02D2545b:17a-34: 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor yang rtsig pa'am
T02D2545b:17a-36: lha dgod pa ni dbus su sangs rgyas snang pa
T02D2545b:17a-37: mtha' yas de la rigs mthun pa'i sems dpa' bzhi
T02D2545b:17a-38: dgod / gzhan yang sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyang mdzes par dgram mo //
T02D2545b:17a-39: khyams su yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgram mo //
T02D2545b:17a-40: sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi gzhag go //
T02D2545b:17a-41: de ltar legs par bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la snang ba thob pa dang /
T02D2545b:17b-0: skal @17b pa dang mthun pa'i me tog gis snyim
T02D2545b:17b-1: pa bkang ba'i slob ma der bcug la lha rnams
T02D2545b:17b-3: de nas yon kyi mchog blangs te dkyil 'khor la
T02D2545b:17b-4: phul la lhag ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis longs
T02D2545b:17b-5: spyad par bya'o // 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas kyi //
T02D2545b:17b-6: dkyil 'khor cho ga bsdus pa las //
T02D2545b:17b-7: dge ba bsags par gyur pa des //
T02D2545b:17b-8: snang ba mtha' yas nyid du shog / snang ba
T02D2545b:17b-9: mtha' yas dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
